transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, good morning.
Customer: Good morning. Bataye.
Executive: Bhaiya aapne kal phone kiya tha hume.
Customer: IndiaMART company se baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: S.S. Agro Enterprise.
Customer: Yes sir. Haan haan wo call kiya tha IndiaMART ki services ke liye.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: IndiaMART ki services aapne liya hua hai na?
Executive: Haan haan. To services liya hua hai abhi services chal nahi raha hai.
Executive: Usi usi ke liye feedback ke liye matlab call kiya tha kya dikkat aa rahi hai matlab consume karne mein leads vagaira to.
Customer: Bhaiya leads ke bare mein aap hume kyun batate ho jiske humko IndiaMART ka services jiske vajah se liya wo banda hamara hume aajkal khabar nahi leta hai. Aap phone karke puchte hain ki kya ho gaya nahi ho gaya. Koi Agarwal karke tha wahi aadmi sala humko roz namaste lagwa lagwaya hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Haan. Ab sala humko isse pehle behtar inquiry aata tha. Ab 1,30,000 se jo abhi kiya tha ab package le liya hai. Abhi leke inquiry vagaira band ho gaya.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Dekhiye jab aap services haan uska lete hain to uske baad aapka account manager change ho jata hai, theek hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To haan. To aapko naya account manager milta hai koi naya, theek hai? To wo aapko call karta hai phir aapko service service mein bataiye ki leads mein calls mein jo aapke paas direct call aa rahi hai.
Customer: Us us bande ne humko us bande ne humko itna commitment kiya tha ki 80 non-lapseable byleads humko milega lekin humko mila kitna 30 ya 25.
Executive: 80 non-lapseable byleads unhone bola tha, theek hai? Aur to aapko mila tha sirf 30 mila hoga, 30 mila hai.
Customer: Haan. Haan.
Executive: 30 mila, theek hai? To theek hai aur Vijay Agarwal naam tha kya unka? Vijay Agarwal jo Vijay Agarwal ji unhone diya tha.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Vijay Agarwal naam tha na jinone ye aapka website service diya hua hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aur bataiye aur kya kya bola hua hai unhone?
Customer: Unhone bola hai ki inquiry ka flow inquiry call vagaira double ho jayega jo humko abhi tak mila nahi hai. Matlab double to chhodiye uska matlab daily ka basis se do ya teen inquiry aa raha hai bataiye. Usse to humko lagta hai ki MBC ki service wale se zyada milta hai humse.
Executive: Matlab bole the acha double ya triple ho jayega aapka.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai aur aur aapke ye teen saal ki service aapne liya hua hai na? Maximizer pe 3.5.
Customer: Ye teen saal teen mahina extra diya hai.
Executive: Kitna?
Customer: Teen saal plus teen mahina.
Executive: Teen saal plus three month extra diya hua hai. Nahi nahi sir galat diya hua hai unhone three teen saal bas matlab teen month nahi milta hai isme.
Customer: To?
Executive: Aur aur bataiye aur kya kya bola hua tha?
Customer: Ek mahina bhi extra nahi diya usne.
Executive: Nahi nahi do month milta hai sirf teen saal ki service pe do month aur kab tak kab tak chalega ye bataya hua hai?
Customer: Wahi to aaj 24 36 38 mahine chalega bola humko aur ye humko na sabse important mere liye ye important nahi hai ki inquiry kitna mil raha hai, lead kitna mil raha hai, lead kitna aa raha hai ye hamare liye mahatvapoorn nahi hai. Hamare liye mahatvapoorn hum usko itna bhi kaha tha ki mere liye sabse mahatvapoorn ye hai ki humko is inquiry chahiye plus call chahiye direct call plus inquiry chahiye. Bhale hi tum humko saal mein do lead do saal bhar mein pura do lead do usse hume koi matlab nahi hai lekin humko bhaiya inquiry chahiye plus calls chahiye.
Executive: Acha matlab aapko lead se matlab nahi hai aapko direct direct inquiry chahiye.
Customer: Haan. Main aapko batao, hello?
Executive: Haan haan sun raha hu sun raha hu boliye. Aap apna kripya karke aap apna shubh naam batayenge hum?
Customer: Dev naam hai mera.
Customer: Dev sahab, hello?
Executive: Haan. Haan haan Dev naam hai mera Dev.
Customer: Acha Dev sahab hum Shabir baat kar rahe hain aur wo hai aur hum baat hum Shabir baat kar rahe hain aur Assam se baat kar rahe hain, hello?
Executive: Haan haan Shabir ji mujhe yaad hai kal hi maine call kiya tha aapko wo theek hai? Haan to.
Customer: Haan. Second number pe kiya tha to unhone aapke bhai bol rahe the I think unhone bola aapse baat karne ke liye.
Executive: Haan haan koi baat nahi wo mera chota bhai hai koi dikkat wali baat nahi. Haan Dev sahab hum jo hai aaj paanch saal ya chhe saal ho gaya hoga aap aap logo se juda hua hai haan. Lekin lekin har bar ka yahi scene hota hai ki pehle to bola jata hai ki bhaiya inquiry double ho jayega ye ho jayega wo ho jayega hume misleading kiya jata hai, misguide kiya jata hai haan.
Hmm.
Customer: Haan jab package payment vagaira kar diya sab kuch kar diya tab jaake hume chutiya banana chalu kar lete hain. Yahi scene hai bhaiya.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Actually maaf karega hum kharab shabd isliye use kar rahe hain kyunki hum takleef mein hai bhaiya do mahine do mahina ho gaya humko payment karaya hua lekin humko sala ek do inquiry agar ek bhi deal ho jata na bhai to hum bolte chalo theek hai koi baat nahi.
Customer: Hum itna bolta ki koi baat nahi kyunki hum jis time payment kiya hai na bhai aap bharosa nahi karoge dusra log to kisi ka pan ke liye bhi paisa nahi dega is saal mein hum paisa diya hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai thoda sa time de de website plan aapne abhi change karwaya hai to thoda sa time bhi lagta hai isme aapka jab ye.
Customer: Bhai aur kitna time lagega bhai aur kitna time.
Customer: Bhai aur kitna time lagega ek mahine se upar hone laga hai aur plus usme kya hai main batao aapko hello?
Executive: Haan haan sun raha hu boliye.
Customer: Jo payment karwaya matlab inquiry vagaira band ho jayega na kya? Payment kara ke humne galti to nahi kiya?
Executive: Nahi nahi sir main aapko abhi to mera haste mein hu main office jaake aapko connect karta hu aap online aa jaiega main aapko dikha bhi dunga. Inquiry vagaira to dekhiye badhegi aapki aisa nahi hai. Leads bhi aapko badhega.
Customer: Bhai bhai wahi baat hume leads se koi matlab nahi hai mere bhai hume leads se koi matlab nahi hai hume inquiry chahiye aur direct call.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm. Jaise main batao aapko kal ka date mein hume matra ek call mila hai.
Customer: Hmm. Shayad ya inquiry mushkil se inquiry mushkil se do aaya hoga bataiye isse behtar to MBC wale ko aata hai.
Executive: Theek hai main dekh leta hu sir kaise kya hai sari cheeze abhi to laptop. Acha aapka khana wana ho gaya subah ka breakfast ho gaya bhai Dev sahab?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji. Haan haan haan main office jaake call karta hu aapko aap call pick kar lijiyega yahi mera number hai save kar lijiye Dev naam hai koi dikkat hota hai isi number pe mujhe connect kijiyega koi bhi IndiaMART se related query hogi turant solve karke dunga theek hai?
Customer: Wo beech mein Ranjit sahab ko ya hume phone kar rahe the.
Executive: Haan Ranjit sir mere senior hain manager hain wo mere.
Customer: Manager hai Ranjit sir?
Customer: Aap aap unse junior hai?
Executive: Haan haan bilkul.
Customer: Acha. Jo bhi hai hume lagta hai ki unko kuch khas pata nahi hai Ranjit sir ko.
Executive: Ranjit sir ko nahi nahi nahi aisi baat nahi hai wo actually leave pe the matlab ghar pe the abhi wo theek hai unka marriage anniversary tha to baat nahi kar paye honge is vajah se sahi se inform. Baki main aapko jo bhi cheez related hai aap mujhse connect kijiyega main aapko guide karta hu jo bhi cheeze hain theek hai. Unko lekar ke hum dedh do ghanta baitha hai beech mein haan.
Customer: Haan. Haan lekin jab se unhone hume profile mein kuch karke diya hai sala lead hi band inquiry hi band ho gaya aana.
Executive: Chaliye main dekh leta hu baki batata hu aapko jo bhi resolution hai kaise kya hai theek hai. Main sara ek baar profile check kar leta hu aapka. Mera number save kar lijiye.
Customer: Itna time se kharab mat bhaiye kitna time se kar rahe hain aap?
Executive: Mujhe char saal ho gaye sir.
Customer: Theek hai koi baat nahi. Kisi bhi jankar aadmi se karaiye bhai kyunki hum bahut pareshan hai kyunki humne jin logo humne jin logo se paisa utha ke aap logo ko paisa diya hai na un logo ka un logo ka phone aane laga hai hume.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Chaliye theek hai main dekh leta hu theek hai theek hai sir. Main kehna kya chah raha hu wo to aap behtar samajh chuke hain na?
Customer: Haan haan bilkul. Haan to bas bhai wahi dekhiye aapko direct aapka do teen question tha jo 80 bylead hai three month extra hai aur direct call direct inquiry aapko zyada chahiye.
Executive: Hmm. Hmm. Chaliye theek hai main abhi jaake office call karta hu aapko theek hai pick kar lijiyega.
Customer: Okay Dev sahab. Okay Dev sahab. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Services not working after taking subscription.

- Commitment of 80 buyleads not fulfilled.

- Inquiry flow and calls not doubled as promised.

- Dissatisfied with current services.

- Wants direct calls and inquiries, not just leads.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the issues raised.

- Assured to check the profile and provide resolution.

- Clarified account manager changes after subscription.

- Mentioned website plan change may take time.

- Confirmed to connect after going to the office.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check the profile and revert.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, buyleads, inquiry, direct calls, account manager
